name: Kattguld
description:
Kattguld - Fool's Gold

This is a turn based game where every move you make moves objects in the world. This mainly means falling objects. There are treasures, hazards and health, watch out what you pick up and use hazards to your advantage. Complete objectives and progress through puzzle like levels. The first couple of levels teach you what to expect when interacting with objects.

This is my first gamejam and published game.

  • Movement: W A S D
  • Wait one turn: Space
  • Pause menu: Escape
  • Music assets from: https://freesound.org/
  • 3D assets were made by me in Blender
